WrestlerMod:Sportsmanship.DESCRIPTION: For every #b2 #yDirty cards you play in the same turn, gain a #yPenalty #yCard.

WrestlerMod:Bravado.DESCRIPTION: When you obtain #b5 #yBravado, gain one of your #yTrademark #yMoves.

WrestlerMod:Dirty.DESCRIPTION: Playing multiple #yDirty cards in the same turn will earn #yPenalty #yCards.

WrestlerMod:Elbow.DESCRIPTION: A 0-cost #yAttack card with #yExhaust that deals modest damage and draws a card.

WrestlerMod:SignatureMove.DESCRIPTION: One of several special attacks that can only be obtained during combat.

WrestlerMod:SignatureMoveCardIndicator.DESCRIPTION: Your trademark move this run is

WrestlerMod:PenaltyCard.DESCRIPTION: Playable status cards which generate a negative effect when gained, and a beneficial effect when played.

WrestlerMod:PenaltyCardBlue.DESCRIPTION: Applies #yPlated #yArmor to a random enemy when gained. Exhaust and draw additional cards next turn when played.

WrestlerMod:PenaltyCardGreen.DESCRIPTION: Lose #yGold at end of turn. Gain #yDexterity when drawn.

WrestlerMod:PenaltyCardOrange.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yFrail at end of turn. Deals damage to ALL enemies when drawn.

WrestlerMod:PenaltyCardRed.DESCRIPTION: Take damage at end turn. Gain #yStrength when drawn.

WrestlerMod:PenaltyCardYellow.DESCRIPTION: Lose #b #yBravado when gained. Exhaust and gain energy next turn when played.

WrestlerMod:PenaltyCardsNoGlyph.DESCRIPTION: Status card with one of several negative effects. Provides a beneficial effect when drawn.

WrestlerMod:Grappled.DESCRIPTION: #yGrappled enemies receive [#ED3030]+30%[] more and deal [#B6F8C0]-30%[] less damage. Grapple breaks once you're dealt #b10 damage in a single turn, or if you Grapple another enemy.

WrestlerMod:Injured.DESCRIPTION: Injured creatures lose HP at the start of their turn, and lose the same HP at end of turn if they attack.

WrestlerMod:Knee.DESCRIPTION: A 1-cost #yAttack card with #yEthereal and #yExhaust that deals moderate damage.

WrestlerMod:BrutesTrophy.DESCRIPTION: A relic which grants 2 #yStrength at the start of each combat.

WrestlerMod:PeoplesCrown.DESCRIPTION: A relic which grants 2 #yDexterity at the start of each combat.

WrestlerMod:CobraClutch.DESCRIPTION: Cobra Clutches are 0-cost #yAttack cards which deal modest damage and apply #yPoison.

WrestlerMod:TemporaryBuffer.DESCRIPTION: Prevents the next time your would lose HP this turn.

Choked.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, loses HP.

Constricted.DESCRIPTION: Constricted creatures take damage at the end of their turn.

Flex.DESCRIPTION: A 0-cost [#9e2b2e]Ironclad Skill card which grants temporary #yStrength.

Stun.DESCRIPTION: Unable to take any combat actions.
